document.subject: TOBACCO LITIGATION MASTER SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT
document.message: This facsimile transmission is intended for the addressee indicated above. It may contain information that is privileged, confidential, or otherwise protected from disclosure. Any review, dissemination, or use of this transmission or its contents by persons other than the addressee is strictly prohibited. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify us immediately by telephone, and mail the original to us at the above address.
